Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - Good access to downtown and subway”

Reviews.Content: hotel rated wife try stay picky isnt bad isnt fanciest nicest hotel stayed clean modern kept pretty location 2 minute walk subway 5 minute ride heart city people reception speak below average english able help required rate hotel rate solid 4
